Gain Exclusive Bonuses and Rewards!

  • Enjoy complete access to our pre-sale tokens before anyone else..
  • Get early access to our Closed-Beta launch (Closed-Alpha has already concluded)..

  • Receive direct entry into our upcoming eSports tournaments.
  • Play our game and earn coins that can be converted into crypto tokens later.

Win
Earn real-world rewards by winning matches. These digital treasures are your gateway to cricketing glory.
Earn
Your victory translates into earnings. You're not just winning matches but earning assets to trade in the marketplace.
